      • saveBestIndividual

        public static void saveBestIndividual(cartesianNetwork.Individual indiv,
                                      java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String fileName)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        saves new Individual only if Fitness is smaller or equal than the fitness of the already saved one
        Parameters:
        indiv - The new Individual
        path - The path where it should check
        fileName - the name of the file it should check and overwrite if necessary
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs during saving/reading
